thread.title: Fitton: Judicial Watch Goes to Court for Accountability over Hillary Clinton’s Mishandling of Classified Emails
thread.title_full: Fitton: Judicial Watch Goes to Court for Accountability over Hillary Clinton’s Mishandling of Classified Emails

author: Tom Fitton
title: Fitton: Judicial Watch Goes to Court for Accountability over Hillary Clinton’s Mishandling of Classified Emails
text: Lawlessness was the modus operandi of the Obama administration. If it felt a law stood in the way of its intentions, it ignored the law. Seems the Obama intelligence agencies learned this lesson well. In the critical matter of Hillary Clinton’s illegal email practices, the Director of National Intelligence simply ignored a directive requiring a damage assessment and a report.
